name: review-daily-notes
description: Roam-like Review page for Daily Notes on Obsidian

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.package: yarn build && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp main.js dist/main.js && cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json && rm -rf ../www/Brain/.obsidian/plugins/review-daily-notes && mkdir ../www/Brain/.obsidian/plugins/review-daily-notes && cp -r dist/* ../www/Brain/.obsidian/plugins/review-daily-notes
